item.title:
Miley Cyrus reveals to @BritishVogue a line from a new song “she hopes to release soon”:
“I know I used to be crazy. I know I used to be fun. You say I used to be wild. I say I used to be young.”
: https://vogue.co.uk/article/miley-cyrus-british-vogue-interview…
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Miley Cyrus on past controversies and being judged:
“I carried some guilt and shame around myself for years because of how much controversy and upset I really caused. Now that I’m an adult, I realise how harshly I was judged. I was harshly judged as a child by adults and now, as… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Miley Cyrus tells @BritishVogue that “Flowers” is “a little fake it till you make it,” revealing the original lyrics were:
“but I can’t love me better than you can. Sure, I can be my own lover, but you’re so much better.”
: https://vogue.co.uk/article/miley-cyrus-british-vogue-interview…
item.author: popcrave
